item.title: Still looking for a suitable replacement for the Oath addon.
Added tons of options for changing colors. Skin Settings/Customization/Choose skin colors.
You can disable this RSS feed by clicking on SYSTEM, then INTERFACE settings.
You can exit the Pluto guide by hitting back or backspace twice. The channels do take a few seconds to load when booting Kodi.
Please read the FAQ under Skin Settings/Help for helpful tips.
Added Samsung+, PBS, and Stirr channels into the EPG and more Aeon skin refinements.
